#SKT.New
+ Create a new socket

##In : 
+ PUSHW = PTR to S.SOCKET template

##Out : 
+ YA = PTR to new S.SOCKET
+ X = hSocket

#SKT.AcceptA
+ Check for an incoming connection

##In : 
+ A = hListeningSocket

##Out : 
+ A = hSocket

#SKT.Send (DGRAM,STREAM,RAW)
+ Send block of data

##In : 
+ PUSHB = hSocket
+ PUSHW = pBuf
+ PUSHW = len

##Out : 
+ A = hFrame

##In :

##Out :

##Out :
